title: Stacklist
description:
Imagine having one place for all your favorite things—whether it’s a hidden gem restaurant, a must-read article, or your top productivity tools. Share all the places you went on a recent trip. Roll up all the links for your podcast or Youtube episode into one link where visitors can save your links + content into their own account.

Stacklist makes it effortless to save, organize, and share what you love, so nothing meaningful gets lost. 🚀
